Articles.Content:
Tower Ironman Challenge

Heloooo, thought i make a fun challenge this time as all my other ones are for professionals , i will also include a point system for this challenge.

What we need to do is build a huge tower and go land it on Minmus or the Mun. There will be 2 divisions, a single launch tower, and a multiple launch tower. Make sure your command module is right at the top, this way we will be able to measure the height of the tower.(example in pictures below)

Rules

Single Launch

  • You have to send up the tower in one go, no adding to it later
  • Choose to land on Minmus or Mun
  • Make sure to Take a screenshot of the tower only on VAB(As in pictures below), without the rockets, this way we will be able to see how high it is
  • You need at least 1 Kerbal to go with you
  • you may use mods, but you will fall under a different category if you do
  • Take a screenshot when your tower has landed safely

Multiple launch

  • You may use multiple launches to add to your tower, BUT you have to land the tower as a single unit, you may not assemble it on the Mun or Minmus
  • Choose to land on Minmus or Mun
  • Make sure to Take a screenshot of every section of the tower on VAB, Add the length of all the sections to get full height
  • You need at least 1 Kerbal to go with you
  • you may use mods, but you will fall under a different category if you do
  • Take a screenshot when your tower has landed safely

Point System

  • Length of your tower x 10
  • 10 points per Kerbal going up
  • 10 points per command module
  • For Minmus multiply total score by 1.5
  • For Mun multiply total score by 2

My score is ((122m x 10) + 10 + 10) x 1.5 = 1860

Pictures

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The small spec on the last photo is a Kerbal lol
